attributes.action: Key workers shouldnt pay income tax this year
attributes.additional_details: To recognise the efforts the key workers have put in during this current health emergency. Without them putting their health on the line to protect others and keep society going, the country would be falling apart. It's about time we appreciate the real cogs that keep society turning and keeping people safe
attributes.background: Key workers to not pay income tax for the financial year as a way of saying thank you during cornavirus outbreak.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
